infoText.NoDevice: No Devices detected, please reload the page
infoText.NoService: No Service detected, please reload the page

URIOfTheProduct.Name: URI of the Product
URIOfTheProduct.Description: Unique global identification of the product instance using an universal resource identifier (URI)

ManufacturerName.Name: Manufacturer Name
ManufacturerName.Description: Legally valid designation of the natural or judicial person which is directly responsible for the design, production, packaging and labeling of a product in respect to its being brought into circulation

ManufacturerProductDesignation.Name: Manufacturer Product Designation
ManufacturerProductDesignation.Description: Short description of the product (short text), third or lowest level of a 3 level manufacturer specific product hierarchy

AddressInformation.Name: Address Information
AddressInformation.Description: Address information in the form of IDTA Submodel Template 'Contact Information' (IDTA Number 02002)

ManufacturerProductRoot.Name: Manufacturer Product Root
ManufacturerProductRoot.Description: Top level of a 3 level manufacturer specific product hierarchy

ManufacturerProductFamily.Name: Manufacturer Product Family
ManufacturerProductFamily.Description: Second level of a 3 level manufacturer specific product hierarchy

ManufacturerProductType.Name: Manufacturer Product Type
ManufacturerProductType.Description: Characteristic to differentiate between different products of a product family or special variants

OrderCodeOfManufacturer.Name: Order Code of Manufacturer
OrderCodeOfManufacturer.Description: Unique combination of numbers and letters issued by the manufacturer that is used to identify the device for ordering

ProductArticleNumberOfManufacturer.Name: Product Article Number of Manufacturer
ProductArticleNumberOfManufacturer.Description: Unique product identifier of the manufacturer

SerialNumber.Name: Serial Number
SerialNumber.Description: Unique combination of numbers and letters used to identify the device once it has been manufactured

YearOfConstruction.Name: Year of Construction
YearOfConstruction.Description: Year in which the manufacturing process is completed

DateOfManufacture.Name: Date of Manufacture
DateOfManufacture.Description: Date when an item was manufactured

HardwareVersion.Name: Hardware Version
HardwareVersion.Description: Version of the hardware supplied with the device

FirmwareVersion.Name: Firmware Version
FirmwareVersion.Description: Version of the firmware supplied with the device

SoftwareVersion.Name: Software Version
SoftwareVersion.Description: Version of the software used by the device

CountryOfOrigin.Name: Country of Origin
CountryOfOrigin.Description: Country where the product was manufactured Note: Country codes defined accord. to DIN EN ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes

UniqueFacilityIdentifier.Name: Unique Facility Identifier
UniqueFacilityIdentifier.Description: Unique string of characters for the identification of locations or buildings involved in a product’s value chain or used by actors involved in a product’s value chain

CompanyLogo.Name: Company Logo
CompanyLogo.Description: A graphic mark used to represent a company, an organisation or a product

AssetSpecificProperties.Name: Asset Specific Properties
AssetSpecificProperties.Description: Asset specific properties of the product
